name: UpdateGoalMetric
description:
Updates a goal's current metric value in Asana.

Use this tool to update the existing metric value of a goal in Asana. It returns the complete updated goal metric record. If the metric does not exist, it will respond with an error.

parameters.name: goal_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the Asana goal to be updated.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the goal.

parameters.name: include_optional_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of optional properties to include in the response.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: resource_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource in Asana, represented as a string.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

parameters.name: resource_base_type
parameters.description: The base type of the resource to update. It must be a string indicating the type of resource.

value_schema.description: The base type of this resource.

parameters.name: current_metric_value
parameters.description: The current numeric value of a goal metric. Required if metric type is number.

value_schema.description: *Conditional*. This number is the current value of a goal metric of type number.

parameters.name: pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for a more readable response format, useful for debugging.
